MERSEYSIDE BATTLE FOR KRUSE

Liverpool are reportedly ready to go head-to-head with Everton for Max Kruse, according to Italian outlet Il Messaggero.

He scored 15 goals for Werder Bremen last season in his debut campaign and could be available for £13m this summer.

TRIO TARGET RAFINHA

Liverpool, Arsenal and Tottenham are all interested in signing Barcelona midfielder Rafinha this summer, according to Spanish newspaper Mundo Deportivo.

Last season, the Brazilian started just 18 games for the club and has struggled to shine at the Nou Camp with the Reds reportedly willing to offer between £26.8m (€30m) and £35.8m (€40m) to secure a deal.

Roma will reportedly complete a deal to sign Leicester City winger Riyad Mahrez on Thursday.

According to BeIN Sports journalist Mohamed Alkawaleny on Twitter, Mahrez will undergo a medical with Roma on Thursday, before being confirmed as a Giallorossi player.

Alkawaleny was also among the first to break news of Mohamed Salah’s transfer to Liverpool, tweeting a deal had been done on June 4 – 18 days before it was made official.
